legendary_sheriff.title: ğŸ† THE LEGENDARY SHERIFF
paragraphs: You have achieved the impossible - maintaining both honor AND wealth!
The Prince himself marvels at your skill. You caught smugglers with precision, yet somehow accumulated a fortune. Some whisper you know secrets... but none can prove corruption. You are a legend.
The people trust you. The Prince rewards you. The kingdom prospers. This is the stuff of ballads and tavern tales!

honorable_sheriff.title: âš”ï¸ THE HONORABLE SHERIFF
paragraphs: You never once accepted a bribe. Your integrity is unquestionable.
The Prince commends your unwavering vigilance and moral fortitude. Tales of your keen eye and honest heart spread throughout the kingdom.
You may not be rich, but you sleep soundly at night. The people of Nottingham know they can trust you.

corrupt_baron.title: ğŸ’° THE CORRUPT BARON
paragraphs: Your pockets are heavy with gold from 'overlooked' contraband.
You've mastered the art of selective enforcement - just enough vigilance to keep your position, just enough corruption to get rich.
The Prince suspects nothing. The merchants know who to pay. You've built a small fortune on bribes and blind eyes. Morally questionable? Perhaps. Profitable? Absolutely.

excellent.title: Excellent Performance
paragraphs: You've proven yourself a capable and trustworthy Sheriff.
The people of Nottingham sleep safer knowing you guard the gate.

good.title: Good Performance
paragraphs: You maintained order at the gate, though some smugglers slipped through.
The Prince is satisfied... for now.

mediocre.title: Mediocre Performance
paragraphs: Your performance was adequate, but barely.
The Prince expects better from his Sheriffs.

poor.title: Poor Performance
paragraphs: Whispers of incompetenceâ€”or worse, corruptionâ€”follow you.
One more shift like this and you'll be looking for new work.

paragraphs: Your reputation has fallen to zero. The Prince has no use for you.
Pack your things. You're finished as Sheriff of Nottingham.
